description: This file declares the RDKShell class and associated structures and classes, which implement a plugin for the WPEFramework. It provides interfaces for remote shell control, event notifications, and management of application clients, including methods for moving, launching, suspending, and configuring applications and system resources. It also defines event constants, internal listeners, and utility classes such as ScreenCapture and TaskQueue.

classes.name: RDKShellApiRequest
classes.description: Structure representing an API request with a name and a JSON request object.

classes.name: RDKShell
classes.description: Main plugin class implementing remote shell functionalities, event handling, application management, and resource control within the WPEFramework.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Handles plugin state change events and manages launch enabling and connection resets.

classes.name: RdkShellListener
classes.description: Event listener for RDKShell application events and system notifications.

classes.name: MonitorClients
classes.description: Monitors plugin clients and manages system event notifications related to plugin lifecycle.

classes.name: ScreenCapture
classes.description: Implements the ICapture interface to provide screen capture functionality and handle screenshot data.

classes.name: TaskQueue
classes.description: A thread-safe queue to manage tasks asynchronously.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Sends an event notification with parameters to the system.

methods.name: pluginEventHandler
methods.description: Handles plugin-related events received via JSON.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Handles launch requests in a separate thread.

methods.name: moveToFront
methods.description: Moves a client to the front of the Z-order.

methods.name: moveToBack
methods.description: Moves a client to the back of the Z-order.

methods.name: moveBehind
methods.description: Moves a client behind a target client.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specific client.

methods.name: getFocused
methods.description: Retrieves the currently focused client.

methods.name: kill
methods.description: Terminates a specified client application.

methods.name: addKeyIntercept
methods.description: Adds a key intercept with specified key code and modifiers for a client.

methods.name: addKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Adds multiple key intercepts.

methods.name: removeKeyIntercept
methods.description: Removes a specific key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyListeners
methods.description: Adds key listeners for a client.

methods.name: removeKeyListeners
methods.description: Removes key listeners for a client.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListener
methods.description: Adds key metadata listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListener
methods.description: Removes key metadata listeners.

methods.name: injectKey
methods.description: Injects a key press event into the system.

methods.name: generateKey
methods.description: Generates a key input sequence for a client.

methods.name: getScreenResolution
methods.description: Retrieves the current screen resolution.

methods.name: setScreenResolution
methods.description: Sets the screen resolution.

methods.name: createDisplay
methods.description: Creates a new display environment for a client.

methods.name: getClients
methods.description: Retrieves a list of client applications.

methods.name: getZOrder
methods.description: Gets the z-order of clients.

methods.name: getBounds
methods.description: Retrieves the bounds of a client.

methods.name: setBounds
methods.description: Sets the bounds of a client.

methods.name: getVisibility
methods.description: Checks if a client is visible.

methods.name: setVisibility
methods.description: Sets the visibility of a client.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Retrieves the opacity level of a client.

methods.name: setOpacity
methods.description: Sets the opacity level of a client.

methods.name: getScale
methods.description: Retrieves scale factors of a client.

methods.name: setScale
methods.description: Sets scale factors of a client.

methods.name: getHolePunch
methods.description: Checks if hole punch is enabled for a client.

methods.name: setHolePunch
methods.description: Enables or disables hole punch for a client.

methods.name: removeAnimation
methods.description: Removes animations from a client.

methods.name: addAnimationList
methods.description: Adds a list of animations.

methods.name: enableInactivityReporting
methods.description: Enables or disables inactivity reporting.

methods.name: setInactivityInterval
methods.description: Sets the inactivity interval.

methods.name: resetInactivityTime
methods.description: Resets the inactivity timer.

methods.name: loadStartupConfig
methods.description: Loads the startup configuration.

methods.name: invokeStartupThunderApis
methods.description: Invokes startup Thunder APIs.

methods.name: subscribeForSystemEvent
methods.description: Subscribes to system events.

methods.name: onTimer
methods.description: Handles internal timer events.

methods.name: ScreenCapture INTERFACE_ENTRY(Exchange::ICapture)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: MonitorClients(RDKShell * shell)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: const TCHAR * Name() const
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: Name
ctags.pattern: /^                virtual const TCHAR* Name() const override { return "ScreenCapture"; }$/
